code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input wire clk,
    input wire a,
    input wire b,
    output reg q,
    output reg state
);

always @(*) begin
    q = (a & ~b) | (~a & b);
end

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (a & b) begin
        state <= ~state;
    end else if (a) begin
        state <= 1'b0;
    end else if (b) begin
        state <= 1'b1;
    end
end

endmodule
```
